thread.title: Reason offered for ‘no Trump supporters’ roommate ad breaks needle off irony meter
thread.title_full: Reason offered for ‘no Trump supporters’ roommate ad breaks needle off irony meter

author: EdJenner
title: Reason offered for ‘no Trump supporters’ roommate ad breaks needle off irony meter
text:
— Chris Egan (@cwegan) February 20, 2017 
Ever since the election, media outlets have been reporting that ads for roommates or room rentals including some form of “no Trump supporters” stipulation have been on the rise. Over the weekend, a woman who made the same demand in a “roommate wanted” ad explained the reason: Woman Says No ‘Trump Supporters’ Roommate Ad Meant to Protect Her Home From ‘Bigots’ https://t.co/uM324IITmQ pic.twitter.com/5vyVUNG0Rh 
There’s video at the link. Irony spotters had a field day: Fighting bigots through bigotry. https://t.co/vCZJSpIHuk 
— Jason Price (@RepublicanPunk) February 20, 2017 Sounds like she’s the bigot. https://t.co/jcajMb6C0T 
— Chris Stamper (@CStamper_) February 20, 2017 The bigotry is coming from inside the house! https://t.co/dKUBkRGbHJ 
— Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) February 20, 2017 So when the left does this, it’s freedom of choice. If the right does it, it’s discrimination. #Hypocrisy https://t.co/O2ziC1RYxe 
— Teresa Jackson (@RestoreHonor) February 20, 2017 Guess she never learned irony in school… https://t.co/N24NObHArR 
— Patrick A. Mendes (@nikeman310) February 20, 2017 @law_newz Bigotry is bigotry……and too often liberals do not recognize their actions to be bigoted….. 
— R Whisk (@RWhisk1) February 20, 2017 This is literally the definition of bigotry #delusional https://t.co/2BjBwblYMA
